sourcesContent:
function Rating(props) {
    const { rating, numReviews, caption } = props;
    return ( <
        div className = "rating" >
        <
        span >
        <
        i className = {
            rating >= 1 ?
            "fas fa-star" :
                rating >= 0.5 ?
                "fas fa-star-half-alt" :
                "far fa-star"
        }
        /> <
        /span> <
        span >
        <
        i className = {
            rating >= 2 ?
            "fas fa-star" :
                rating >= 1.5 ?
                "fas fa-star-half-alt" :
                "far fa-star"
        }
        /> <
        /span> <
        span >
        <
        i className = {
            rating >= 3 ?
            "fas fa-star" :
                rating >= 2.5 ?
                "fas fa-star-half-alt" :
                "far fa-star"
        }
        /> <
        /span> <
        span >
        <
        i className = {
            rating >= 4 ?
            "fas fa-star" :
                rating >= 3.5 ?
                "fas fa-star-half-alt" :
                "far fa-star"
        }
        /> <
        /span> <
        span >
        <
        i className = {
            rating >= 5 ?
            "fas fa-star" :
                rating >= 4.5 ?
                "fas fa-star-half-alt" :
                "far fa-star"
        }
        /> <
        /span> <
        div > < /div> <
        span > { numReviews }
        reviews < /span> {
            caption ? < span > { caption } < /span> : console.log(numReviews)} <
                /div>
        );
    }
    export default Rating;
